languages.text: "Прекрасно понимая, в сколь опасную игру она вздумала сыграть, я и не подумал бы ее отговаривать. Немного удачи — и мы могли бы вообще забыть о Комморре".
"Knowing full well how precarious her grand plan was, I made no attempt to talk her out of it. With a little luck, we wouldn't have need worry about Commorragh's influence."
languages.original_text: "Прекрасно понимая, в сколь опасную игру она вздумала сыграть, я и не подумал бы ее отговаривать. Немного удачи — и мы могли бы вообще забыть о Комморре".

traits.locale_text: "Understanding how dangerous a game that she wanted to play was, I wouldn't have even tried to talk her out of it. With a bit of luck, we could just forget about Commorragh.
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Understanding how dangerous a game that she wanted to play was, I wouldn't have even tried to talk her out of it. With a bit of luck, we could just forget about Commorragh.
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Understanding how dangerous the game she wanted to play was, I wouldn't have even tried to talk her out of it. With a bit of luck, we could just forget about Commorragh."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Understanding how dangerous the game she wanted to play was, I wouldn't have even tried to talk her out of it. With a bit of luck, we could just forget about Commorragh."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Knowing full well how precarious her grand plan was, I made no attempt to talk her out of it. With a bit of luck, we could have simply forgotten about Commorragh."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Knowing full well how precarious her grand plan was, I made no attempt to talk her out of it. With a little luck, we wouldn't have need worry about Commorragh's influence."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Conscient de la précarité de son plan, je n'ai pas tenté de la dissuader. Je me disais que si la chance était de notre côté, nous n'aurions bientôt plus à nous soucier de l'influence de Commorragh. »
languages.original_text: "Knowing full well how precarious her grand plan was, I made no attempt to talk her out of it. With a little luck, we wouldn't have need worry about Commorragh's influence."

traits.locale_text: « Conscient de la dangerosité du jeu auquel elle voulait se livrer, je n'ai pas tenté de la dissuader. Avec un peu de chance, nous aurions pu simplement oublier Commorragh. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Consciente de los numerosos riesgos de su gran plan, no hice el menor intento de disuadirla. Con un poco de suerte, no tendríamos que volver a preocuparnos por la influencia de Commorragh».
languages.original_text: "Knowing full well how precarious her grand plan was, I made no attempt to talk her out of it. With a little luck, we wouldn't have need worry about Commorragh's influence."

traits.locale_text: «Al comprender lo peligroso que era lo que planeaba, ni siquiera habría intentado disuadirla. Con algo de suerte, podríamos olvidarnos de Commorragh por completo».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “我很清楚她所谓的计划有多不靠谱，所以我也没打算说服她放弃计划。如果运气好的话，说不定甚至可以彻底解决掉科摩罗这个麻烦。”
languages.original_text: "Knowing full well how precarious her grand plan was, I made no attempt to talk her out of it. With a little luck, we wouldn't have need worry about Commorragh's influence."

traits.locale_text: “我很清楚她打算玩的这场游戏有多危险，我根本不打算说服她放弃计划。如果运气不错的话，说不定甚至可以彻底解决掉科摩罗这个麻烦。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Ich wusste wohl, wie gefährlich ihr großer Plan war, und habe keinen Versuch unternommen, ihn ihr auszureden. Mit etwas Glück hätten wir uns nicht um Commorraghs Einfluss sorgen müssen."
languages.original_text: "Knowing full well how precarious her grand plan was, I made no attempt to talk her out of it. With a little luck, we wouldn't have need worry about Commorragh's influence."

traits.locale_text: "Mir war klar, wie gefährlich das Spiel war, das sie spielen wollte. Ich hätte daher nicht einmal versucht, es ihr auszureden. Mit ein wenig Glück könnten wir Commorragh einfach völlig vergessen."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「その壮大な計画がどれほど不確かなものなのかを理解していれば、彼女を説得してやめさせようとはしなかっただろう。少しの幸運があれば、コモラフの影響を心配する必要もなかったかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "Knowing full well how precarious her grand plan was, I made no attempt to talk her out of it. With a little luck, we wouldn't have need worry about Commorragh's influence."

traits.locale_text: 「その壮大な計画がどれほど不確かなものなのかを理解していれば、彼女を説得してやめさせようとはしなかっただろう。少しの幸運があれば、コモラフの影響を心配する必要もなかったかもしれない」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Büyük planının ne kadar tehlikeli olduğunu bildiğim için onu caydırmaya çalışmadım. Şansımız yaver giderse Commorragh'ın etkisi hakkında endişelenmemize gerek kalmayacaktı."
languages.original_text: "Knowing full well how precarious her grand plan was, I made no attempt to talk her out of it. With a little luck, we wouldn't have need worry about Commorragh's influence."
